Summary: Incredibly bright, large light HIGH over Little Badger Mtn.
divs: sighting detailsdriving home to pick something up before taking my family to dinner. facing little badger mtn (s-sw) there was an incredibly bright, large light high over the mountain, near my home. i initially thought it might be a planet- although it was too close and too bright. i took 2 pictures after watching it for a bit-it didn't do anything. then i left and came back 30 min later and it was gone!(i stopped in the same place where i took the picture) checked surrounding areas and didn't see anything. photos show a bright, round orb with fuzzed edges above the line of the mountain. it was too high to be a man-made light, too bright and close to be a star\planet.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Richland
There were no other sightings in Richland on or around November 21st 2013
